Mermaid Idols Sing a Siren's Song in "Bermuda Triangle ~Colorful Pastrale~" TV Anime Teaser
Related Article
paragraph:
A teaser trailer, the OP / ED theme song performers, and the Japanese release date have been revealed for Bermuda Triangle ~Colorful Pastrale~, an upcoming TV anime based on the mermaid idol characters from Bushiroad's popular Cardfight!! Vanguard franchise.  The opening theme, entitled "Wonderland Girl", is performed by Pastel＊Palettes. The ending theme, entitled "Shabon" ("Bubbles"), is performed by Colorful Pastrale, a 5 member voice unit composed of the main cast of Bermuda Triangle ~Colorful Pastrale~.  Bermuda Triangle ~Colorful Pastrale~ is directed by Junji Nishimura and features animation production by Seven Arcs Pictures. The series will broadcast in Japan on Tokyo MX on Saturdays during the 22:00 time slot (10:00 PM JST) beginning on January 12, 2019. Sources:OtakomuOfficial Bermuda Triangle ~Colorful Pastrale~ TV anime home page --- Paul Chapman is the host of The Greatest Movie EVER! Podcast and GME! Anime Fun Time.
